issue.title: [CF 274] Lua error-.-need long title
issue.body:
1x AceLocale-3.0-6: TellMeWhen: Missing entry for "This should be used when you want to track multiple states/textures/etc of a cooldown. Some examples are Holy Word: Chastise and Dark Simulacrum. IMPORTANT: The action being tracked MUST be on your action bars for this icon type to work. You should also make sure that the ability is in its default state before leaving config mode."
TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen-r192.lua:3598: in function "TT"
TellMeWhen_Options\TellMeWhen_Options-r192.lua:1584: in function "SetupRadios"
TellMeWhen_Options\TellMeWhen_Options-r192.lua:1811: in function "Load"
<string>:"*:OnMouseUp":5: in function <string>:"*:OnMouseUp":1

Locals:
nil


> Posted by CurseForge user lsjyzjl | Imported from CurseForge issue #274 | Raw

comments.body:
Right click the icon to open icon editor got this error.


> Posted by CurseForge user lsjyzjl

Yeah, I did some mass find-and-replace with the tooltip code and I screwed up in a few places. Forgot to commit the fix.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Fixed in r193.


> Posted by CurseForge user lsjyzjl
